metadata.title: CVE-2016-6802 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Apache Shiro before 1.3.2 allows attackers to bypass intended servletfilters and gain access by leveraging use of a non-root servlet contextpath.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6802` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libshiro-java - 1.2.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: shiro package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
